49013efe-8d7e-44f1-9460-a3fa491f4797.name: Check if invoice data exists
49013efe-8d7e-44f1-9460-a3fa491f4797.description: Check if invoice data is available in the collection
49013efe-8d7e-44f1-9460-a3fa491f4797.__wwdescription: Check if invoice data is available in the collection

workflows.description: Fetch invoice data from the API and store it in the invoices variable. This script will run when the page loads and populate the table with invoice data from get_invoices.data, specifically extracting the personName and totalAmount fields.

workflows.name: Fetch Invoices
workflows.description: Fetch invoice data from the API and store it in the invoices variable. This script will run when the page loads and populate the table with invoice data from get_invoices.data, specifically extracting the personName and totalAmount fields.

display.code:
const roll_id = "rol_3vXHI50DTQuwJey0"

const find_data = collections['156db10f-63e1-439a-9d41-853177cf90b0']
    ?.['data']
    ?.['data']
    ?.some(item => item.id === roll_id)

return find_data ? "Flex" : "None"
//return find_data ? "None" : "Flex"

display.code:
const roll_id = "rol_3vXHI50DTQuwJey0"

const find_data = collections['156db10f-63e1-439a-9d41-853177cf90b0']
    ?.['data']
    ?.['data']
    ?.some(item => item.id === roll_id)

return find_data ? "None" : "Flex"

interactions.name: Toggle Sidebar

__ID_1__.name: Toggle sidebar collapsed state
__ID_1__.description: Toggle the isSidebarCollapsed variable between true and false
__ID_1__.__wwdescription: Toggle the isSidebarCollapsed variable between true and false

__ID_2__.name: Update menu width
__ID_2__.description: Set menu width to 60px when collapsed, 280px when expanded
__ID_2__.__wwdescription: Set menu width to 60px when collapsed, 280px when expanded

interactions.description: Toggle the sidebar collapsed state and update the menu width accordingly. When collapsed, width is 60px. When expanded, width is 280px.
